paste.body:
#!/bin/bash
# a simple shell script that helps randomly choosing from this anonymous public ID list:
# http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1545519505_13CFz29UuNbUx54HmLqQBfxPQNN2FmfdAq/6+shared+ZeroID+accounts+you+can+use+for+anonymous+posting

location=~/ZeroBundle

idlist[0]="0e48fa196c10ef219b51b65a13dc332a225d030fc1af00494ce40d7ad86fbb89"
idlist[1]="12ac9ce0f396cf2eec6bfb518d1db51154aab8859076b53025245a7ff074e711"
idlist[2]="57d619db5d3e2aafdf77a55c32dc4aec48f58cca0505f08e2c29a099e47187f2"
idlist[3]="5a9e3a5040ad8ed8891e8740b3c88707b8aa288b7048e8e42ba72dcacb826b94"
idlist[4]="7d0ae0e2bebafb7d02440979c407896796727e30a5d2c27565ed1d1ea2ba4f87"
idlist[5]="7d555a6adbfce31f35719621865cad6785bae29a7c53953073a746a4e8350172"
idlist[6]="b9306105cab09071d20a89e6cef5badf73472507d33d58359f43a327c314a4e3"
idlist[7]="be1d20522e8741cf44395a82cd8a84db3bf1a61cca53d3b6a86efc4f454c1895"
idlist[8]="c6407645950d6768e2a11b4b775595307d5a8fbdd0e79594c2bdffc4d3888b66"
idlist[9]="f8a2db8f0f471ae4ac9cbf1225082790b683e7fd0df1ed7dbb4177dd051e1e21"
idlist[10]="public01public02public03public04public05public06public07public08"

# generating a random index 
n="${#idlist[@]}"
random_index=$(($RANDOM % $n))

# checking if xclip is istalled 
if ! which xclip > /dev/null; then
    echo "Please install xclip to use this script."
    exit 1
fi

if cd $location ; then
    # checking if Multiuser plugin is enabled 
    if [ -d ZeroNet/plugins/disabled-Multiuser ] ; then
	# enabling Multiuser plugin
	mv ZeroNet/plugins/disabled-Multiuser ZeroNet/plugins/Multiuser
	# copying random ID to clipboard
	echo "${idlist[$random_index]}" |  xclip -selection c
	# stariting ZeroNet
	./ZeroNet.sh
    else
	echo "${idlist[$random_index]}" |  xclip -selection c 
	./ZeroNet.sh
    fi
    # disabling multiuser plugin 
    mv ZeroNet/plugins/Multiuser ZeroNet/plugins/disabled-Multiuser
else
    echo "$location does not exist."
    exit 2
fi
